channel.title: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |
channel.description:
[CENTER] [size=14pt][url=http://hollowrealm.net/Hollow%20Realm%20Launcher.jar]Play Hollow Realm[/url] ~ [url=http://hollowrealm.net/forums]Forums[/url] ~ [url=http://hollowrealm.net/]Website[/url][/size]
Some of you may have known my other servers, both named Hollow Realm. I personally believe we had a good reputation, and I hope the same goes for this server as well.
[SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE] [SIZE=3]- 200+ Clean Custom Items - Mystery Boxes - Crystal Chest - Achievements - Team Dungeoneering - 7 Minigames - Multiple Quests - Spawnable Sets - Random Events - Fullscreen and Resizeable - HD Client - Boss and Custom Pets - All Skills Work - Fully working bank tabs - Fully Working Clan Chat - 317, 474, 562, 600, 602 Client Settings - Player Owned Shops[/SIZE]

item.title: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |
item.dc:creator: @hollowrealm hollowrealm
item.description:
@hollowrealm wrote:

UPDATES FOR 5/31/2015 AS FOLLOWED

07 bosses now have their own abilities and combat scipts
Commands now displayed in a interface
Mob drops are now done through their own file, not just rare,common, etc.
Added Overloads
Added 100m tickets
Added Seeds to Farming shop
Added Essence to Runecrafting shop
Now yells when a new player logs in
Fixed more random 0 prices in shops
Max cape in cape shop is no longer a null
Started Highscores

Other bugs I can’t think of.

You can see the full thread [URL=http://hollowrealm.net/forums/index.php?topic=41.0]HERE[/URL]

Read full topic

item.title: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |
item.dc:creator: @hollowrealm hollowrealm
item.description:
@hollowrealm wrote:

UPDATES FOR 5/30/2015 AS FOLLOWED

G Altar at home, prayer should be a lot easier
No longer have to log out of dungeoneering to leave
07 bosses have drops now
DDS is no longer op
tutorial is no longer required, there is an option now.
Removed spawnable sets, noone used them and the made the goal of the server confusing.
Agile armour is no longer glitchy
Added 100m tickets with shop.
Fixed random prices of 0 in shops
Yell is no longer bland, has custom colors etc.

You can view the full thread [URL=http://hollowrealm.net/forums/index.php?topic=25.msg39#msg39]HERE[/URL]

Read full topic

item.title: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Just wondering, whats a “Clean Custom”?

I was confused by this, what he means by clean customs is the custom items that are added, the models are clean, and professional.
Like use boomscape for example, there’s alot of customs that have messed up looks, or doesn’t look how it should, and alot of them the inventory model picture is shitty and looks like a couple globs you’re equipping lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

-Bump this thread- Server is coded efficiently, unique content is being added, there’s slim to no bugs.
Great staff team, and developers, this server is packed with things to do, and has a good economy.
XP rates, aren’t too slow, and aren’t too high, there’s alot of updates, and this being a brand new server is improving fast, minor touch-ups are done everyday, overall a good server and I’d suggestion this server to anyone who’s looking for a real player-ready server, that has a challenge to it, but it’s fun. This IS new, and is going to be a long-term project.

Read full topic
item.source: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |

item.title: Hollow Realm | 200+ Clean Customs | Team Dungeoneering | Player Owned Shops |
item.dc:creator: @hollowrealm hollowrealm
item.description:
@hollowrealm wrote:

UPDATES FOR 5/29/2015 AS FOLLOWED

Client now downloads cache properly
Yells now include your title instead of "Hollow Realm"
Vote shop is now at home
Players now receive 1m instead of 2.5m for each crystal key, thus making voting more fair.
Weapon animations have now been fixed (Courtesy of Andrew)
Double xp is now enabled
Xp lamps no longer give 3m xp, but are cheaper in the vote shop
Started on a new, fresh starter
New items in the vote shop
Added O7 bosses, scorpia, callisto, venanatis (DROPS ARE NOT ADDED YET - any suggestions?)

MORE TO COME

Read full topic
